title: VOLO is a planning application for an avid plane spotter. VOLO helps you plan your sighting trips ahead of time by letting you search for weather information, aircraft landings and take-offs at select airports by aircraft type up to a week ahead.

icons.name: location
icons.description: Find locations near major airports where you can watch planes take off and land.

icons.name: airplane
icons.description: Want to see an A380 take off or land? Find out when you can see it at your selected location.

icons.name: weather
icons.description: Thinking of going planespotting? Check out the weather forecast first!
